body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current behaviour

I had a running bitcoin core 22.0.0 on a linux computer which was running 8 months ago. I turned on this machine today and trying to access a wallet but the wallet loading takes forever and never returns success or fail!
I have then updated the core to 26.0.0 and that didn't make any difference.
Every other aspect seems to be working fine include creating and loading the newly created wallets.
I have tried the console but again not difference 
![Screenshot 2024-03-01 at 15 53 45](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/assets/19202935/d0f34cee-4381-4562-af19-befaff26acba)


### Expected behaviour

Expect success or fail prompt with an error message on fail.

### Steps to reproduce

Not sure how that can be replicated without sharing my wallet!

### Relevant log output

_No response_

### How did you obtain Bitcoin Core

Pre-built binaries

### What version of Bitcoin Core are you using?

26.0.0

### Operating system and version

Linux Debain 11 bullseye

### Machine specifications

The OS runs on proxmos VM, which runs on hp rack server. Happy to provide more specific info if helpful.
title: loadwallet hangs on forever!
